title: 24 hr concierge, 2 min walk to TARGET! Up to 10 weeks FREE!
posting_body: This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 609 Sq.
Centrally located in SoMa in the heart of 5M, San Francisco’s newest destination.
The George presents a new level of urban living.
Thoughtful and well-crafted interiors combined with sweeping views define a distinct collection of apartment homes, ranging from studios to two-bedroom apartments.
Just steps away from The Parks at 5M, residents have unlimited access to restaurants, cultural institutions, and longstanding local businesses, as well as vibrant community programming and events.

Panelized dishwashers, Caesarstone kitchen counters, Hunter Douglas Rolling shades, Stainless steel appliances, Hardwood style flooring, Gas ranges, Keyless Latch® entry system, Sweeping city views through oversized windows*, UVC Germicidal & HEPA filtration units in elevator cabs, Fitwel 2 Star certified building, Solar shades in living area with blackout shades in studio units, Air conditioning, Bosch® washers and dryers, Pursuing LEED Silver certification, Walk-in showers*, Elfa walk-in closets*

Private Residential Bar, Penthouse Terraces, Bike storage, Grills, Covered On-site parking spaces with EV charging stations, Co-working library, Luxer® smart package room and lockers, Communal Work Spaces, Free Weights, Clubroom, Resident lounges, Hospitality Inspired Two-Story Lobby, Double-height Fitness Area, Fitness Center Lockers, 24/7 Concierge, Pet grooming stations, Spacious Fitness Center, Fitness-on-demand, Communal Table, Ballet Barre, State-of-the art fitness center, Private Library, Private open air terraces with grilling stations and dining areas, Private events kitchen and dining
Please call the leasing office for complete pet policy information.
